item.title: Blind
item.description: [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/everything.md#i-dont-know-what-else-you-could-want-from-me-cause-i-did-all-i-should-vyl-wnanory|Today my awakening was different]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/everything.md#i-dont-know-what-else-you-could-want-from-me-cause-i-did-all-i-should-vyl-wnanory|I’m dazzled by the hidden truth]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/everything.md#i-dont-know-what-else-you-could-want-from-me-cause-i-did-all-i-should-vyl-wnanory|it woke me up]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/everything.md#i-dont-know-what-else-you-could-want-from-me-cause-i-did-all-i-should-vyl-wnanory|with sharp screams, it shook me up]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/everything.

item.title: Broken Wings
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/leave_out_all_the_rest.md#dont-be-afraid-vyl-wnanory|The fetters are loose now but the reddened wrists will be visible forever]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/leave_out_all_the_rest.md#dont-be-afraid-vyl-wnanory|I was standing on the edge, I’ve lost almost my spirit, my path]] [[songs/c/curve/the_new_adventures_of_curve/every_good_girl.

item.title: Cardiac Silhouette
item.description: [[songs/m/michael_oakley/california/rabbit_in_the_headlights.md#its-gotta-be-me—theres-no-way-vyl-wnanory|Another sleepless night, time stands still, minutes seem like hours, hours like days]] [[songs/m/michael_oakley/california/rabbit_in_the_headlights.md#its-gotta-be-me—theres-no-way-vyl-wnanory|I take a deep breath, open my eyes and clench my hand into a fist]] [[songs/m/michael_oakley/california/rabbit_in_the_headlights.

item.title: Chapters
item.description: [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/simple_design.md#its-all-right-its-all-right-vyl-wnanory|Looking back on my footsteps on the cold ground, feeling like fleeing]] [[songs/t/the_used/the_used/greener_with_the_scenery.md#you-took-it-back-vyl-wnanory|They say the path I took should be my fate, but I wanna take my lazy steps on my own]] [[songs/t/the_used/the_used/greener_with_the_scenery.

item.title: Crumble
item.description: [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/dear_god.md#dear-god-the-only-thing-i-ask-of-you-vyl-wnanory|The grey clouds obliterate the light blue sky, they’re approaching quickly]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/dear_god.md#dear-god-the-only-thing-i-ask-of-you-vyl-wnanory|The sloppy and filthy streets are reflecting the human condition]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/avenged_sevenfold/dear_god.

item.title: Deliverance (feat. Patrick Schmid)
item.description: [[songs/w/wumpscut/embryodead/war.md#and-suddenly-there-was-war-vyl-wnanory|It was a long way, it took a long time to find a safety like this]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/lion.md#remember-an-army-of-all-those-little-kids-vyl-wnanory|I was almost giving up all my hope but in the end the picture in my head surpassed my expectations]] [[songs/g/gianna_minichiello/gianna_minichiello/what_ifs.

item.title: Hero
item.description: [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/prey_for_me.md#prey-for-me-i-think-i-owe-you-an-apology-vyl-wnanory|It is the darkest night, stars invisible]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/prey_for_me.md#prey-for-me-i-think-i-owe-you-an-apology-vyl-wnanory|The only thing I can feel is your cold fear, your shivering hands, controlling gaze]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/prey_for_me.

item.title: Invisible Scars
item.description: [[songs/m/ministry/twitch/the_angel.md#always-an-angel-there-vyl-wnanory|I hope there is an end of this story]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/what_we_do.md#i-cant-take-this-all-my-life-is-reckless-vyl-wnanory|Everywhere I go, everytime I sleep I go around in the circle, again and again]] [[songs/k/korn/the_paradigm_shift/what_we_do.

item.title: Scissorhands
item.description: [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#i-believe-in-vyl-wnanory|I forget my own rules, but I still know the end of the story]] [[songs/p/picture_perfect/ep2/denim.md#im-always-losing-myself-losing-myself-vyl-wnanory|What’s happened to the world, what’s happened to my life?

item.title: The Gift
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/lion.md#hey-i-never-meant-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|I was falling for a long time]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/lion.md#hey-i-never-meant-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|Almost everything I knew became more fucking worthless]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/lion.md#hey-i-never-meant-to-let-go-vyl-wnanory|So many promises, so much energy]] [[songs/t/taproot/bluesky_research/calling.

item.title: The Writer
item.description: [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/theres_a_good_reason_these_tables_are_numbered_honey_you_just_havent_thought_of_it_yet.md#havent-you-heard-that-im-the-new-cancer-vyl-wnanory|It’s your turn right now]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/theres_a_good_reason_these_tables_are_numbered_honey_you_just_havent_thought_of_it_yet.md#havent-you-heard-that-im-the-new-cancer-vyl-wnanory|Let me see your steps, let me feel your hesitation]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/theres_a_good_reason_these_tables_are_numbered_honey_you_just_havent_thought_of_it_yet.md#havent-you-heard-that-im-the-new-cancer-vyl-wnanory|Nothing ventured, nothing gained]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/theres_a_good_reason_these_tables_are_numbered_honey_you_just_havent_thought_of_it_yet.
